allWines.name: Terra Serena Prosecco Frizzante Treviso
allWines.description: Everything is simple with this prosecco: you need to take 6 immediately so as not to return a second time Terra Serena Prosecco Frizzante is an example of a good and simple prosecco that should be bought by the case in summer. Light and refreshing, soft small bubbles, a floral aromatic profile and a slight pleasant sweetness on the palate.

allWines.name: Moet Chandon Rose Imperial
allWines.description: Moet & Chandon Rose Imperial is a spontaneous, radiant, romantic expression of the Moet & Chandon style - a style characterized by bright fruitiness, seductive flavors and elegant maturity. Moet & Chandon Rose Imperial Champagne reflects the diversity and complementarity of three grape varieties: pinot noir (40% to 50%), pinot meunier (30% to 40%), and chardonnay (10% to 20%).

allWines.name: Terra Fresca Spago Frizzante
allWines.description: Terra Fresca Spago Frizzante was created specifically for Aperol, but it became my top seller: it is taken home, at buffets, banquets and corporate parties Terra Fresca Spago Frizzante is made entirely in the style of Prosecco, but the geography of origin of the grape is wider, so it cannot be called Prosecco according to Italian law.

allWines.name: Settesoli Nero d’Avola Sicilia
allWines.description: Settesoli Nero dAvola - Nero dAvola from Sicily, which is always associated with rich 'heavy' wines, but not this time. A drinkable, clean and well-balanced wine with a juicy berry-fruit profile.The aroma is fresh, with bright notes of ripe cherry.

allWines.name: Latinium Liebfraumilch
allWines.description: Latinium Liebfraumilch German semi-sweet white dry wine.The taste of Latinium Liebfraumilch: balanced, with a slight sourness and apple notes Aroma of Latinium Liebfraumilch: fruity.Color of Latinium Liebfraumilch: pale straw

allWines.name: Jack Rabbit
allWines.description: Jack Rabbit Medium Sweet Red is a semi-sweet red wine made from Cabernet and Senso grapes. I highly recommend it to those who like semi-sweet lambrusco and similar light drinking wines. The aroma is creamy, fruity and berry. Taste Jack Rabbit Medium Sweet Red: Velvety and soft, with hints of blackcurrant and blackberry, a sweet aftertaste. Jack Rabbit Medium Sweet Red is a fun label, a cool price, and a nice drinkable wine inside.

allWines.name: Costa Bricco Asti Spumante
allWines.description: Costa Bricco Asti Spumante is a classic sparkling Asti DOCG from southeastern Piedmont. Tasty, light, cheerful. Color of Costa Bricco Asti Spumante: pale gold. The aroma of Costa Bricco Asti Spumante: fragrant, delicate, with light notes of acacia, juicy grapes and flowers. Taste of Costa Bricco Asti Spumante: fresh and sweet, with predominant notes of ripe fruit and flowers.

allWines.name: Val d’Oca Rive di Santo Stefano Prosecco Superiore Valdobbiadene
allWines.description: Val dOca Rive di Santo Stefano is a rather rare example of prosecco of the Extra Brut category and the driest wine in the terroir line of Le Rive. Val dOca Rive di Santo Stefano is a prosecco from a single vineyard located next to the famous Cartizze hill. Exceptionally strict in its style, sparkling wine with shades of flowers, citrus and emphasized minerality and dryness in the taste.

allWines.name: Maison Castel
allWines.description: Every second, 19 bottles of Maison Castel wine are sold in the world (by the time you read this far, over 80 bottles have been sold). As? Here, for example, in this bottle is exactly what you want to get from Sauvignon Blanc. 100% hit. No surprises. From bottle to bottle, from year to year - exactly what you expect. Exactly what you pay for. Color of Maison Castel Sauvignon Blanc: pale yellow. Aroma of Maison Castel Sauvignon Blanc: intense, with floral notes and mineral nuances. Taste of Maison Castel Sauvignon Blanc: bright, fresh, mineral.

allWines.name: El Coto Rioja Rosado
allWines.description: El Coto Rioja Rosado is a light pink Spanish wine. 'Drinkable. Not poor' says one of the worst reviews on Vivino. Quite unexpectedly finely done for Spain, I would add. And for an expectedly good price. The color is very pale pink. The aroma is delicate, with notes of wild berries, strawberries and ripe cherries. The taste of El Coto Rioja Rosado 2019 is also delicate, refreshing, but quite rich and only slightly sweet. Drink as fresh, young and as possible walking

allWines.name: Masseria Altemura Zinzula
allWines.description: Zinzula Rose was made in 2018 and is off to a great start: the first vintage Zinzula Rose 2018 received 90 and 91 points from Wine Enthusiast and Falstaff. The wine is named after the grotto of Zinzulusa, known for its 'zinzuli' - stalactite formations that turn pink and incredibly beautiful at sunset. Actually, the bottle, glass cap and design are also references to the crystal clear waters of the Mediterranean Sea

allWines.name: Mud House Central Otago
allWines.description: Mud House Central Otago Pinot Noir is a juicy and seductive New Zealand pinot noir from Central Otago. The aroma is expressive, juicy, with notes of ripe cherries and red berries, spices, with spicy shades of oak. The taste is balanced, smooth, with notes of dark fruits, with polished tannins, subtle acidity of fresh fruits. The aging potential of Mud House Central Otago Pinot Noir is 5 years.

allWines.name: Domaine de L’A Castillon-Cotes
allWines.description: Domaine de LA Castillon-Cotes is a good basic chianti, which Luca Maroni gave 93-95 points in different years and which in the early 2000s was the most sold in the world. The aroma is fresh, fruity, with notes of cherry, black currant and a hint of spices and flowers. The taste of Domaine de LA Castillon-Cotes is young, juicy, with hints of cherry and spices. It is a soft, fresh and well-balanced wine

popularWines.name: Terra Serena Prosecco Frizzante Treviso
popularWines.description: Everything is simple with this prosecco: you need to take 6 immediately so as not to return a second time Terra Serena Prosecco Frizzante is an example of a good and simple prosecco that should be bought by the case in summer. Light and refreshing, soft small bubbles, a floral aromatic profile and a slight pleasant sweetness on the palate.
